comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: On the right, New York Giants Catcher Chief Meyers, who would end his long tenure with the Giants at the end of the 1915 season to play for their Brooklyn rivals, the Robins (Dodgers). www.baseball-almanac.com/teamstats/schedule.php?y=1915&am... On the left, Brooklyn Catcher Lew McCarty, who would also switch teams and play for the Giants in 1916. www.baseball-almanac.com/players/player.php?p=mccarle01
